title: Average ticket price Chicago Blackhawks ( NHL ) 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2007/08 to 2008/09, slightly increasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, and lastly roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2011/12.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008/09 and 2009/10.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 55.72 was reported at Year 2011/12
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 46.8 was reached at Year 2008/09
